sentences.english: We sat down on the park bench and watched the people as they passed.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在公园的长凳上，把稳考察着来往的行人。

sentences.english: Sleeping naked on benches by the lake under the sun of summer, is quite a leisure that I can certainly enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的时候坦腹睡在岸边的长凳上，也是自得其乐。

sentences.english: He took a hammer from the bench and picked out a few nails from one of the disordered bins.
sentences.chinese: 他从长凳上拿起锤子，又从杂物箱里摸出了几个钉子。

sentences.english: Instead, she sits on a park bench a few hundred feet away.
sentences.chinese: 她在离人群几百英尺远的公园长凳上坐了下来。

sentences.english: Lie facedown over a bench with your legs hanging o the edge.
sentences.chinese: 面朝下卧在一个长凳上，双腿悬在长凳外。

sentences.english: Lie facedown over a bench with your legs hanging o the edge.
sentences.chinese: 面朝下卧在一个长凳上，双腿悬在长凳外。

sentences.english: Holding a dumbbell in each hand, place one foot on a bench, so that your knee is bent to about 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 两手分别各持一哑铃单足立于长凳之上。

sentences.english: He laid off his sweat suit on a bench and went into the shower room.
sentences.chinese: 他把球衫往长凳上一放就到沐浴室去了。

sentences.english: A long upholstered bench placed against or built into a wall.
sentences.chinese: 软长椅靠墙放置或安在墙上的软型长凳。

sentences.english: He watched as the brothers completed their entrance and positioned themselves before polished oak pews.
sentences.chinese: 他看着武士们全部进场安坐在擦亮的橡木长凳上。

sentences.english: He sat on the bench without movement.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在长凳上，一动不动。

sentences.english: The two of them were necking on a park bench.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩在公园的长凳上拥抱亲吻。

sentences.english: On his bench in Madison Square Soapy moved uneasily.
sentences.chinese: 索比急躁不安地躺在麦迪逊广场的长凳上。

sentences.english: A small girl was sleeping on a bench while her mother worked. She was photographed by Theresia Aggas, 16.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在长凳上睡着了，他的母亲在身边劳作。

sentences.english: I had no writing desk before. I did my homework on a .
sentences.chinese: 以前我没有写字台，我总是在一条长凳上写作业。

sentences.english: The old man edged along on the bench towards the window.
sentences.chinese: 那老人在长凳上侧身慢慢向窗口移动。
